name: Sun Wukong

skills.name: Gotcha!
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Chance increases to 50% if the target has any buffs (booked values improve chances).
skills.notes: Stronger stun chance versus buffed targets; high value in Arena.

skills.name: Staff Of Wonder
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Ignores 50% of the target's DEF. If the initial target is killed, will apply the surplus damage to all remaining enemies (surplus attacks also ignore 50% DEF). This attack cannot be critical. If the initial target survives, places a [Sheep] debuff on them for 1 turn (this Sheep cannot be blocked by Polymorph).
skills.notes: Primary nuke; surplus damage behavior makes targeting squishiest enemy optimal. Sheep placement on survive is a powerful control tool.

skills.name: Now You See Us
skills.description: Removes all buffs from all enemies, then attacks all enemies. Places a [Block Buffs] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns after stealing buffs.
skills.notes: Excellent against buff-heavy bosses (Hydra) and Arena defenses.

skills.name: Unbeatable Wukong
skills.description: Revives this Champion with 100% HP and 100% Turn Meter 3 turns after they were killed.
skills.notes: Counts turns from all participants; interacts with Block Revive / Block Passive debuffs. Core to his Arena value.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in Arena battles by 28%.
forms.comments: Top-tier Arena champion. Excels at buff strip, control, and anti-mythic counterplay.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, ATK%/C.DMG for damage
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, ATK%/C.DMG for wave clear
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 300+ SPD, 350+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG for nuke

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI, but may use A3 on low-value targets if not manually controlled.

mechanics_advisory: Immune to Sheep. Excels at stripping buffs and controlling mythics in Arena. Build for high speed and accuracy.
